RealmID._comment: Description: ID of the Realm using this config.
Important:   RealmID must match the realmlist inside the auth database.
DataDir._comment: Important:   DataDir needs to be quoted, as the string might contain space characters.
LogsDir._comment: Important:   LogsDir needs to be quoted, as the string might contain space characters.
Logs directory must exists, or log file creation will be disabled.
Default:     Logs - (Log files will be stored in the current path)
WorldServerPort._comment: Description: TCP port to reach the world server.
InstanceServerPort._comment: Description: TCP port to for second world connection.
BindIP._comment: Description: Bind world server to IP/hostname.
Default:     0.0.0.0 - (Bind to all IPs on the system)
MySQLExecutable._comment: Description: The path to your MySQL CLI binary.
PacketLogFile._comment: Description: Binary packet logging file for the world server.
Filename extension must be .pkt to be parsable with WowPacketParser.
MaxNumberLogRotations._comment: Description: Number of logs to keep in rotation. A new log is rotated in at every server startup. ex: WorldServer.1.log
MaxLogSize._comment: Description: Max Size of a log file in MB before its rotated.
UseProcessors._comment: Description: Processors mask for Windows based multi-processor systems.
1  - 1st CPU only, 2 - 2nd CPU only, 3 - 1st and 2nd CPU, because 1 | 2 is 3
ProcessPriority._comment: Description: Process priority setting for Windows based systems.
Details:     On Windows, process is set to HIGH class.
RealmsStateUpdateDelay._comment: Description: Time (in seconds) between realm list updates.
PlayerLimit._comment: Description: Maximum number of players in the world. Excluding Mods, GMs and Admins.
Important: If you want to block players and only allow Mods, GMs or Admins to join the
server, use the DB field auth.realmlist.allowedSecurityLevel.
MaxOverspeedPings._comment: Description: Maximum overspeed ping count before character is disconnected.
GridUnload._comment: Description: Unload grids to save memory. Can be disabled if enough memory is available
to speed up moving players to new grids.
BaseMapLoadAllGrids._comment: Description: Load all grids for base maps upon load. Requires GridUnload to be 0.
This will take around 5GB of ram upon server load, and will take some time
Default:     0 - (Don't preload all base maps, dynamically load as used)
1 - (Preload all grids in all base maps upon load)
InstanceMapLoadAllGrids._comment: Description: Load all grids for instance maps upon load. Requires GridUnload to be 0.
Upon loading an instance map, all creatures/objects in the map will be pre-loaded
Default:     0 - (Don't preload all base maps, dynamically load as used)
1 - (Preload all grids in the instance upon load)
SocketTimeOutTime._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) after which a connection being idle on the character
SocketTimeOutTimeActive._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) after which an idle connection is dropped while
The client sends keepalive packets every 30 seconds. Values <= 30s are not recommended.
SessionAddDelay._comment: Description: Time (in microseconds) that a network thread will sleep after authentication
protocol handling before adding a connection to the world session map.
GridCleanUpDelay._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) grid clean up delay.
MinWorldUpdateTime._comment: Description: Minimum time (milliseconds) between world update ticks (for mostly idle servers).
MapUpdateInterval._comment: Description: Time (milliseconds) for map update interval.
ChangeWeatherInterval._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) for weather update interval.
PlayerSaveInterval._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) for player save interval.
DisconnectToleranceInterval._comment: Description: Tolerance (in seconds) for disconnected players before reentering the queue.
DetectPosCollision._comment: Description: Check final move position, summon position, etc for visible collision with
other objects or walls (walls only if vmaps are enabled).
0 - (Disabled, Less position precision but less CPU usage)
CheckGameObjectLoS._comment: Description: Include dynamic game objects (doors, chests etc.) in line of sight checks.
UpdateUptimeInterval._comment: Description: Update realm uptime period (in minutes).
MaxCoreStuckTime._comment: Description: Time (in seconds) before the server is forced to crash if it is frozen.
AddonChannel._comment: Description: Configure the use of the addon channel through the server (some client side
addons will not work correctly with disabled addon channel)
CleanCharacterDB._comment: Description: Clean out deprecated achievements, skills, spells and talents from the db.
PersistentCharacterCleanFlags._comment: Description: Determines the character clean flags that remain set after cleanups.
This is a bitmask value, check /doc/CharacterDBCleanup.txt for more
Example:     14 - (Cleaning up skills, talents and spells will remain enabled after the
Default:     0  - (All cleanup methods will be disabled after the next cleanup)
GameType._comment: 16 - (FFA_PVP, Free for all PvP mode like arena PvP in all zones except rest
RealmZone._comment: RealmZone
Description: Server realm zone. Set allowed alphabet in character, etc. names.
Default      1  - (Development   - any language)
2  - (United States - extended-Latin)
3  - (Oceanic       - extended-Latin)
4  - (Latin America - extended-Latin)
5  - (Tournament    - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
6  - (Korea         - East-Asian)
7  - (Tournament    - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
8  - (English       - extended-Latin)
9  - (German        - extended-Latin)
10 - (French        - extended-Latin)
11 - (Spanish       - extended-Latin)
12 - (Russian       - Cyrillic)
13 - (Tournament    - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
14 - (Taiwan        - East-Asian)
15 - (Tournament    - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
16 - (China         - East-Asian)
17 - (CN1           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
18 - (CN2           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
19 - (CN3           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
20 - (CN4           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
21 - (CN5           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
22 - (CN6           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
23 - (CN7           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
24 - (CN8           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
25 - (Tournament    - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
26 - (Test Server   - any language)
27 - (Tournament    - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
28 - (QA Server     - any language)
29 - (CN9           - basic-Latin at create, any at login)
StrictPlayerNames._comment: Description: Limit player name to language specific symbol set. Prevents character
creation and forces rename request if not allowed symbols are used
Default:     0 - (Disable, Limited server timezone dependent client check)
2 - (Enabled, Strictly realm zone specific, See RealmZone setting,
Note: Client needs to have the appropriate fonts installed which support
the charset. For non-official localization, custom fonts need to be
3 - (Enabled, Basic Latin characters + server timezone specific)
StrictCharterNames._comment: Description: Limit guild/arena team charter names to language specific symbol set.
Prevents charter creation if not allowed symbols are used.
Default:     0 - (Disable, Limited server timezone dependent client check)
2 - (Enabled, Strictly realm zone specific, See RealmZone setting,
Note: Client needs to have the appropriate fonts installed which support
the charset. For non-official localization, custom fonts need to be
3 - (Enabled, Basic Latin characters + server timezone specific)
StrictPetNames._comment: Description: Limit pet names to language specific symbol set.
Prevents pet naming if not allowed symbols are used.
Default:     0 - (Disable, Limited server timezone dependent client check)
2 - (Enabled, Strictly realm zone specific, See RealmZone setting,
Note: Client needs to have the appropriate fonts installed which support
the charset. For non-official localization, custom fonts need to be
3 - (Enabled, Basic Latin characters + server timezone specific)
DeclinedNames._comment: Description: Allow Russian clients to set and use declined names.
Default:     0 - (Disabled, Except when the Russian RealmZone is set)
Expansion._comment: Description: Allow server to use content from expansions. Checks for expansion-related
map files, client compatibility and class/race character creation.
0 - (Disabled, Ignore and disable expansion content (maps, races, classes)
MaxWhoListReturns._comment: Description: Set the max number of players returned in the /who list and interface.
CharactersPerAccount._comment: Description: Limit number of characters per account on all realms on this realmlist.
CharactersPerRealm._comment: Description: Limit number of characters per account on this realm.
SkipCinematics._comment: Description: Disable cinematic intro at first login after character creation.
Prevents buggy intros in case of custom start location coordinates.
Default:     0 - (Show intro for each new character)
1 - (Show intro only for first character of selected race)
MaxPlayerLevel._comment: Description: Maximum level that can be reached by players.
Important:   Levels beyond 110 are not recommended at all.
MinDualSpecLevel._comment: Description: Level requirement for Dual Talent Specialization.
StartPlayerLevel._comment: Description: Starting level for characters after creation.
StartDeathKnightPlayerLevel._comment: Description: Starting level for death knights after creation.
StartDemonHunterPlayerLevel._comment: Description: Starting level for demon hunters after creation.
StartEvokerPlayerLevel._comment: Description: Staring level for evokers after creation.
StartAlliedRacePlayerLevel._comment: Description: Staring level for allied races after creation.
StartPlayerMoney._comment: Description: Amount of money (in Copper) that a character has after creation.
DisableWaterBreath._comment: Description: Required security level for water breathing.
AllFlightPaths._comment: Description: Character knows all flight paths (of both factions) after creation.
InstantFlightPaths._comment: Description: Flight paths will take players to their destination instantly instead
of making them wait while flying.
CastUnstuck._comment: Description: Allow casting the Unstuck spell using .start or unstuck button in client
InstancesResetAnnounce._comment: Description: Announce the reset of one instance to whole party.
MaxPrimaryTradeSkill._comment: Description: Maximum number of primary professions a character can learn.
MinPetitionSigns._comment: Description: Number of required signatures on charters to create a guild.
MaxGroupXPDistance._comment: Description: Max distance to creature for group member to get experience at creature
MaxRecruitAFriendBonusDistance._comment: Description: Max distance between character and and group to gain the Recruit-A-Friend
MinQuestScaledXPRatio._comment: Description: Min ratio of experience that a quest can grant when player level scaling is factored.
Example:     50 (No less than 50% experience granted from a lower leveled quests completion)
100 (Quests always grant full experience upon completion)
Default:     0 - (Quests too low may grant no experience)
MinCreatureScaledXPRatio._comment: Description: Min ratio of experience that a creature kill can grant when player level scaling is factored.  This
will also allow spell procs to trigger, such as Drain Soul, if > 0 and exp is grantable.
Example:     50 (No less than 50% experience granted from a lower leveled creature kill)
100 (Creature kills always grant full experience upon kill)
Default:     0 - (Creatures too low may grant no experience)
MinDiscoveredScaledXPRatio._comment: Description: Min ratio of experience that an area discovery event will grant when player level scaling is factored.
Example:     50 (No less than 50% experience granted from discovering a new section of map)
100 (Map exploration always grant full experience upon discovery)
Default:     0 - (No experience granted when discovered area is too low level)
MailDeliveryDelay._comment: Description: Time (in seconds) mail delivery is delayed when sending items.
CleanOldMailTime._comment: Description: The hour at which old mails will be returned or deleted by the server.
This can be any integer number from 0 to 23. 20 will be 8pm server time.
OffhandCheckAtSpellUnlearn._comment: Description: Unlearning certain spells can change offhand weapon restrictions
Default:     1 - (Recheck offhand slot weapon at unlearning a spell)
0 - (Recheck offhand slot weapon only at zone update)
ClientCacheVersion._comment: Description: Client cache version for client cache data reset. Use any value different
from DB and not recently been used to trigger client side cache reset.
Default:     0 - (Use DB value from world DB version.cache_id field)
BeepAtStart._comment: Description: Beep when the world server finished starting.
Motd._comment: Description: Message of the Day, displayed at login. Use '@' for a newline.
Example:     Welcome to John's Server!@This server is proud to be powered by Trinity Core.
Default:     Welcome to a Trinity Core server.
Motd: Welcome to a Forged Core server.
AccountInstancesPerHour._comment: Description: Controls the max amount of different instances player can enter within hour.
BirthdayTime._comment: Description: Set to date of project's birth in UNIX time. By default the date when
CacheDataQueries._comment: Description: Server caches data queries at startup.
Can be disabled if not enough memory is available.
AllowLoggingIPAddressesInDatabase._comme: Description: Specifies if IP addresses can be logged to the database
TalentsInspecting._comment: Description: Allow/disallow inspecting other characters' talents.
Default:     1 - (Enabled for characters of the same faction)
ThreatRadius._comment: Description: Distance for creatures to evade after being pulled away from the combat
starting point. If ThreatRadius is less than creature aggro radius then aggro
CreatureFamilyFleeAssistanceRadius._comm: Description: Distance for fleeing creatures seeking assistance from other creatures.
CreatureFamilyAssistanceRadius._comment: Description: Distance for creatures calling for assistance from other creatures without
CreatureFamilyAssistanceDelay._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) before creature assistance call.
CreatureFamilyFleeDelay._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) during which creature can flee if no assistance was
MonsterSight._comment: Description: The maximum distance in yards that a monster creature can see
Increases CONFIG_SIGHT_MONSTER to 50 yards. Used to be 20 yards.

Respawn.WarningMessage: There will be an unscheduled server restart at 03:00. The server will be available again shortly after.

ChatFakeMessagePreventing._comment: Description: Additional protection from creating fake chat messages using spaces.
Collapses multiple subsequent whitespaces into a single whitespace.
Not applied to the addon language, but may break old addons that use
normal chat messages for sending data to other clients.
PartyLevelReq._comment: Description: Minimum level at which players can invite to group, even if they aren't on
the invitee friends list. (Players who are on that friend list can always
PreserveCustomChannels._comment: Description: Store custom chat channel settings like password, automatic ownership handout
or ban list in the database. Needs to be enabled to save custom
world/trade/etc. channels that have automatic ownership handout disabled.
Default:     0 - (Disabled, Blizzlike, Channel settings are lost if last person left)
PreserveCustomChannelInterval._comment: Description: Interval (in minutes) at which custom channel data is saved to the database
PreserveCustomChannelDuration._comment: Description: Time (in days) that needs to pass before the customs chat channels get
cleaned up from the database. Only channels with ownership handout enabled
Default:     14 - (Enabled, Clean channels that haven't been used for 14 days)
PartyRaidWarnings._comment: Description: Allow any user to use raid warnings when in a 5-man party.
AutoJoinChatChannel._comment: Description: Has all players auto join this chat channel when a new character is created.
HonorPointsAfterDuel._comment: Description: Amount of honor points the duel winner will get after a duel.
ResetDuelCooldowns._comment: Description: Reset all cooldowns before duel starts and restore them when duel ends.
ResetDuelHealthMana._comment: Description: Reset health and mana before duel starts and restore them when duel ends.
NoResetTalentsCost._comment: Description: Resetting talents doesn't cost anything.
ShowKickInWorld._comment: Description: Determines whether a message is broadcast to the entire server when a
ShowMuteInWorld._comment: Description: Determines whether a message is broadcast to the entire server when a
ShowBanInWorld._comment: Description: Determines whether a message is broadcast to the entire server when a
RecordUpdateTimeDiffInterval._comment: Description: Time (in milliseconds) update time diff is written to the log file.
Update diff can be used as a performance indicator. Diff < 300: good
performance. Diff > 600 bad performance, may be caused by high CPU usage.
MinRecordUpdateTimeDiff._comment: Description: Only record update time diff which is greater than this value.
PreventRenameCharacterOnCustomization._c: Description: If option is set to 1, player can not rename the character in character customization.
Applies to all character customization commands.
Default:     0 - (Disabled, character can be renamed in Character Customization)
1 - (Enabled, character can not be renamed in Character Customization)
